### About Me

I am a recent graduate of the [Master of Environmental Data Science](https://bren.ucsb.edu/masters-programs/master-environmental-data-science) program at UCSB. My [capstone](https://bren.ucsb.edu/projects/reproducible-machine-learning-approach-interpreting-ecohydrologic-model-outputs) research involved the use of decision-tree-based algorithms to explore variable importance from ecohydrologic model output.

As an experienced data scientist currently working in economic consulting, my specialties are econometric analysis, time-series forecasting, technical reports/research, and developing/maintaining data pipelines.
